forum.name: dragon's board
forum.description: words and things from a delinquent "adventurer" from the kingdom of paetyl

thread.title: nerdy things

comments.text: collection of things from other games/media that i made in anyland. may have functionality, mostly stuff that looks cool.
buster sword from final fantasy 7. makes cool fx when swinging and hitting stuff.
double barrel shotgun from devil may cry. actually shoots on trigger pull.
acrid from risk of rain, specifically ror2. just a statue/plush, set as holdable.
wiggler helmet- very laggy! best armor in monster hunter world. sticks out greatly from many of the subpar designs in that game...
wiggler helmet "finger puppet"- trigger while holding gives you a wiggler helmet for wiggly situations.
game clam from wayneradiotv! best game console ever, hands down. has slapable buttons and denim jean padding.
game clam console- slimmest console ever (b/c all compnents are in the controller). requires pearls containing game data to operate.

thread.latestCommentText: game clam console- slimmest console ever (b/c all compnents are in the controller). requires pearls containing game data to operate.
